name: Kettlebell Reverse Lunge Swing
description: Step back into a reverse lunge while swinging the kettlebell forward to shoulder height. The backward step and forward swing create a counter-balance effect. Drive through the front heel to return to standing as the bell swings back down. Alternate legs each rep. Builds leg power and cardiovascular endurance.

media.caption: 4 Kettlebell Lunge Variations for Athletic Performance
